name: Blessed Are the Meek
description:
In a world of astrological powers and constant conflict, a girl sets out to save her sibling from themself. Journey across the planet, meet new allies, and uncover the secrets of astrology to defeat those who seek to use the power of the stars for their own twisted ends.

Controls:

  • Left click/F: Use ability (attack)
  • WASD: Move
  • Click "continue" on dialogue boxes to progress conversations
